name: Bingworld
description:
Bingworld is a game about luck.

You have to get a card of 20 random numbers from 1 to 60.

You can generate infinite cards until you are satisfied with the combination you want.

Then you start the cage's draw.

40 random numbers will be drawn, those numbers in your card that combine with a drawn number will be colored in green.

At any time you can mute the sound(which is in portuguese), pause, restart or quit the game.

Get fun and good luck!
